quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Roseanne and Hill Street Blues
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, chicken. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the name of the alcoholic drink Becky makes for her and her friend when Dan and Roseanne leave them home by themselves for the first time in the Roseanne series?
Which one of the Friends can speak French and attempts to teach it to Joey in Season 10, in the episode The One Where Joey Speaks French?
In the TV series Roseanne, a door to door salesman drops dead in the Conner kitchen one day. The Conners have to try to hide the body while prospective buyers come to the house to buy what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Washer and Dryer

questions.question: In the Friends episode from Season 2, TOW the Chicken Pox, who played Phoebes Navy friend Ryan, who didnt care if she gave him chicken pox or not?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Charlie Sheen

questions.question: What actor played Captain Frank Furillo on the long running 80s police drama Hill Street Blues?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Daniel J. Travanti

questions.question: When TV characters D.J. and Dan Conner have a camp out in the back yard inside the tent, Roseanne brings them a snack. What snack does she bring?
At the start of the series Hill Street Blues, Frank Furillo was having an affair with a lawyer from the public defenders office. What was her name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Joyce Davenport

questions.question: On the Roseanne show, after Jackie gets beaten up by her boyfriend Fisher, who walks in on her in the bathroom and discovers her secret?
In an episode of the Roseanne show, Dan says that one of the kids looks just like Roseanne. Which child is he talking about?
Who was the creator of the immensely popular 80s television show Hill Street Blues?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Steven Bochco

questions.question: What was the name of the detective on the show Hill Street Blues, who used to growl and act peculiar all the time?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mick Belker

questions.question: There was a spin-off of the 80s television show Hill Street Blues.
On the TV show Roseanne, when Roseanne and Jackies Dad dies, Roseanne makes Jackie call a relative to give the bad news. Who is it?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Auntie Barbara

questions.question: What character did former NY Jets football player Ed Marinaro portray on the show Hill Street Blues?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Officer Joe Coffey

questions.question: What year did the popular television show Hill Street Blues first hit the airwaves?

What year did the popular 80s television show Hill Street Blues leave the airwaves?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Seven Mary Three

questions.question: What kind of creature named Topper does Kris Kringle meet on his journey in the Christmas classic Santa Claus Is Comin to Town?
In the animated Christmas classic, Santa Claus Is Comin to Town, Kris meets and falls for Jessica. What is Jessicas job in town?
In Santa Claus Is Comin to Town, what type of magical object did the Winter Warlock give to Kris as a token of friendship?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A magical snowball

What state was the show CHiPs set in?

What was the middle name of Rob and Laura Petries son, Ritchie on The Dick Van Dyke Show?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sid the Snitch

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Star Trek and Voyager
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, clavin. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What popular sitcom actor starred in the Star Trek: Voyager episode Think Tank as the head of a super intelligent group of problem solvers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jason Alexander

questions.question: At the end of Season 5 of Star Trek: Voyager, the U.S.S. Voyager discovers that it is not the only Federation ship stranded in the Delta Quadrant.  What is the name of the other ship?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: U.S.S. Equinox

questions.question: In the Star Trek: Voyager episode False Profits, two castaways from what Alpha Quadrant race have set themselves up as gods on a Delta Quadrant planet?
In the famous Jeopardy episode of Cheers, which was not one of the categories chosen by Cliff Clavin?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Useless Trivia

questions.question: The actor who played Cliff Clavin was actually the only actor from Cheers who had lived in Boston at one time.
In the Star Trek: Voyager episode The Caretaker, the U.S.S. Voyager is trapped in the Delta Quadrant, while pursuing a vessel commanded by what suspected Maquis terrorist?
What Delta Quadrant-native species is Kes from Star Trek: Voyager?

In Scorpion, an episode of the Star Trek: Voyager, Janeway and the Voyager crew are forced to create an alliance with the Borg in order to fight what race of beings, whose credo is the weak will perish?
In the Jeopardy episode of Cheers, how much money did Cliff Clavin have before going into Final Jeopardy?
Which member of the Star Trek: The Next Generation crew becomes obsessed with bringing Voyager home from the Delta Quadrant, sometimes to the detriment of his career and sanity?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Reginald Barclay

questions.question: What was the name of Cliff Clavins short-time girlfriend in the hit series Cheers?
What is the human name of Star Trek: Voyagers Seven of Nine, the borg drone rescued by Voyager and incorporated into the crew?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Annika Hansen

questions.question: In the Star Trek: Voyager episode Thirty Days, Tom Paris spends a month in the brig for breaking the Prime Directive and disobeying orders, while trying to save an alien world made up of 100% water.  What further punishment does Paris receive after being released from the brig?

options.text: Six months of night shift duties
He was confined to quarters for the remainder of the voyage home
He was busted down to Ensign

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was busted down to Ensign

questions.question: According to the Star Trek: Voyager episode The 37s, what famous American pilot, was abducted from earth and left in stasis on an alien world?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Amelia Earhart

questions.question: In Star Trek: Voyager, what name does Voyagers Emergency Medical Hologram take for himself when he is called into full-time service as the ships Chief Medical Officer?

options.text: He does not take a name

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He does not take a name
